title: The owner/developer agreeing to rectify the defects in the works, if any, in terms of Undertaking separately given by the owner
clause_text: The owner/developer agreeing to rectify the defects in the works, if any, in terms of Undertaking separately given by the owner. Any other conditions as may deem fit and proper in the interest of general public. On............................................. Day of the month of
